a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Prevalence of modern contraception methods vs. women's
Share of women who are practicing, or whose sexual partners are practicing, at least one modern method of contraception.
Educational attainment is quantified as the average number of years of formal education received by women between the
Average years of schooling for 15-64 years women
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024); Barro and Lee (2015); Lee and Lee (2016)
